statements: SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT subscription_id, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, user_id, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, frequency FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency IN ('Monthly', 'Weekly');
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, user_id, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency = 'monthly' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, start_date, end_date, frequency FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT subscription_id, user_id, start_date, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT user_id, frequency FROM recurring_payments WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT subscription_id, subscription_name, amount FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_name, start_date, amount FROM subscriptions WHERE next_payment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_type, execution_date, status FROM tasks WHERE subscription_id = 'xyz789';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 'abc123' AND amount > 50;
SELECT subscription_name, start_date, amount FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_id = '123456' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, subscription_name, amount FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_type, s.user_id, s.subscription_name FROM tasks t JOIN subscriptions s ON t.subscription_id = s.subscription_id WHERE t.status = 'pending';

SELECT s.subscription_name, s.amount, t.task_id, t.execution_date FROM subscriptions s LEFT JOIN tasks t ON s.subscription_id = t.subscription_id WHERE t.status IS NULL ORDER BY s.amount DESC, t.execution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT subscription_name, amount FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, subscription_name, amount FROM subscriptions WHERE amount >= 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount, status FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, scheduled_time FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE completed = false;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_name DESC, start_date ASC
SELECT subscription_name, amount FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount, status FROM payment_history WHERE status = 'success'
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE completed = FALSE ORDER BY task_id ASC
SELECT subscription_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_name LIKE '%gold%'
SELECT * FROM Subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM Subscriptions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT subscription_id, billing_frequency FROM Subscriptions WHERE billing_frequency = '1 month';
SELECT * FROM Subscriptions WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT customer_email, f_name, l_name FROM Customers ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM Subscriptions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, billing_frequency FROM Subscriptions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND billing_frequency = INTERVAL '1 month';
SELECT customer_email, f_name, l_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT task_name, task_description, status FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT user_id, plan_id, start_date FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE scheduled_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM subscriptions JOIN users ON subscriptions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT subscription_id, plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT plans.plan_name, subscriptions.start_date, subscriptions.end_date FROM plans INNER JOIN subscriptions ON plans.plan_id = subscriptions.plan_id;
SELECT users.name, payments.amount, payments.payment_date FROM users LEFT JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.subscription_id;
SELECT subscription_id, task_description, scheduled_date FROM tasks ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
